ProductInfo.Features:
16 CH Video Input H.264 triplex real time economical stand alone DVR
Graphical interface, easy to use. Backup file supports windows media player
Supports Remote Review via iPhone, Google Phone
Network file share function, support composite video, VGA and HDMI output
Package included:  1 of 16 Channel DVR with 2TB HD, 16 of  Outdoor Security Cameras with Brackets, 16 of 12V DC Power Supplies and 16 of Video Power Extension Cables
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 16 Channel CCTV Surveillance Camera DVR System H.264 Security 2000GB Standalone Digital Video Recorder Network Remote Real Time with Color CCD Outdoor Day Night Vision Bullet Cameras, Extension Cables and Power Supplies WL6
